member.name: POINTERINACTIVE
member.summary: Indicate the activation policy of the object and are used in the method.

member.name: POINTERINACTIVE.POINTERINACTIVE_ACTIVATEONENTRY
member.summary: The object should be in-place activated when the mouse enters it during a mouse move operation.

member.name: POINTERINACTIVE.POINTERINACTIVE_DEACTIVATEONLEAVE
member.summary: The object should be deactivated when the mouse leaves the object during a mouse move operation.

member.name: POINTERINACTIVE.POINTERINACTIVE_ACTIVATEONDRAG
member.summary: The object should be in-place activated when the mouse is dragged over it during a drag and drop operation.
